lead_paragraph: Aaron Ramsey scored to lift Arsenal to a 1-0 victory over Burnley, though Chelsea still had a 4-point lead over Arsenal and had played two fewer games.

headline.print_headline: Arsenal Maintains Hope With Eighth Straight Win
headline.main: With Eighth Straight Win, Arsenal Keeps Alive Faint Hopes for Title

snippet: Aaron Ramsey scored to lift Arsenal to a 1-0 victory over Burnley, though Chelsea still had a 4-point lead over Arsenal and had played two fewer games.
abstract: Soccer Roundup; Arsenal defeats Burnley, 1-0; other soccer matches noted.
